original_title: Mga Eksena sa Buhay ng Kontrabida
overview: Jake is a villain. He's violent, selfish, and reckless. Unfortunately, Jake doesn't exist in a vacuum, and his behavior has consequences. Because Jake is a villain, people around him feel threatened, and these people look for ways to solve the problem that is Jake. Part origin story, part family drama, the play is a collection of conversations heard in the vicinity of a villain.
title: Mga Eksena sa Buhay ng Kontrabida
